name: UAS Security Bot - Standalone
author: support@ative.com
description: ATIVE UAS Security Bot - Standalone deployment (no subdirectory extraction needed)
startup: if [[ -d .git ]] && [[ {{AUTO_UPDATE}} == "1" ]]; then git pull; fi; if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [[ ! -z ${UNNODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm uninstall ${UNNODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [ -f /home/container/package.json ]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install; echo "Rebuilding Canvas for container compatibility..."; /usr/local/bin/npm rebuild canvas || echo "Canvas rebuild warning (continuing anyway)"; fi; /usr/local/bin/node "/home/container/${MAIN_FILE}"

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# UAS Security Bot - Standalone Installation
# Simple installation without subdirectory extraction

apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python3 python3-dev python3-pip libtool

# Install Canvas dependencies
apt install -y libcairo2-dev libpango1.0-dev libjpeg-dev libgif-dev librsvg2-dev pkg-config

echo -e "updating npm. please wait..."
npm install npm@latest --location=global

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
    echo -e "assuming user knows what they are doing have a good day."
    exit 0
fi

## add git ending if it's not on the address
if [[ ${GIT_ADDRESS} != *.git ]]; then
    GIT_ADDRESS=${GIT_ADDRESS}.git
fi

if [ -z "${USERNAME}" ] && [ -z "${ACCESS_TOKEN}" ]; then
    echo -e "using anon api call"
else
    GIT_ADDRESS="https://${USERNAME}:${ACCESS_TOKEN}@$(echo -e ${GIT_ADDRESS} | cut -d/ -f3-)"
fi

## Standard git clone - no extraction needed
if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo -e "/mnt/server directory is not empty."
    if [ -d .git ]; then
        echo -e ".git directory exists"
        if [ -f .git/config ]; then
            echo -e "loading info from git config"
            ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        else
            echo -e "files found with no git config"
            echo -e "closing out without touching things to not break anything"
            exit 10
        fi
    fi

    if [ "${ORIGIN}" == "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
        echo "pulling latest from github"
        git pull
    fi
else
    echo -e "/mnt/server is empty.\ncloning files into repo"
    if [ -z ${BRANCH} ]; then
        echo -e "cloning default branch"
        git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    else
        echo -e "cloning ${BRANCH}"
        git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    fi
fi

echo "Installing nodejs packages"
if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}
fi

if [ -f /mnt/server/package.json ]; then
    echo "Installing dependencies..."
    /usr/local/bin/npm install --production
    echo "Rebuilding Canvas module for container compatibility..."
    /usr/local/bin/npm rebuild canvas || echo "Canvas rebuild warning (module may need fresh install)"
    echo "Canvas rebuild attempted"
fi

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0

GitHub Repo to clone

Example: https://github.com/username/repo-name

variables.description: Skip git and use uploaded files

variables.description: Discord bot token for UAS bot
